values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. 
Please call us back as soon as you can to schedule your intro class at no cost to you. 
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi !  
You contacted us two weeks ago about trying Gracie Barra Brazillian Jiu-Jitsu. 
Please let us know if you have a good time to come in for a trial class. 
If you're more comfortable attending your first class with a family member or friend, you're very welcome to. 
Kind Regards, 
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. 
Please call us back to organise your intro class at no cost to you! 
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name')! 
This is ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Self Defense. 
I wanted to send you a super quick reminder about your/your childâ€™s intro class at ${Intro Scheduled Time}! 
Please come about 15 minutes early so I have time to get member('First Name') into the proper uniform size, introduce them to our amazing instructors, and answer any questions you may have. Make sure you bring water to help keep hydrated and simply wear slip on shoes on your feet. 
Here is our address ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. 
We look forward to meeting you!

Hi member('First Name'),

We noticed you haven't been on the mats in a little while. We look forward to getting you back to
your training. Let us know when you'll be back, and if there is anything we can help with. 
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name'),
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} knows life gets busy, but we miss you on the mats! We are fired up to get you back
to your training. See you soon! 
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

label: Leads-When intro does not attend the intro class

values.Template Name: When intro does not attend the intro class
values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Sorry we missed you for your intro class! Please reply to this text to let us know when the best
time is to reschedule. We look forward to seeing you on the mats. 
Kind Regards, 
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name'),  
I just wanted to send you a reminder that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} was unable to process your last payment. 
Please contact the school to update your information.
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

I'm just following up about your last payment. We weren't able to process your
membership payment. This could be due to many different reasons. 
Please contact the school to update your information.

Kind Regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Hi member('First Name'), 
We need your assistance.
For the past week, we have been trying to contact in order to update your financial information for your
membership. 
Please contact the school so we can get your account up to date.
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name')! 
You're all booked in for your intro class at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} on ${Intro Scheduled Date}!
I will supply a uniform for you to wear for the intro class. Please arrive 15 minutes early so you have time to get changed and meet the instructors. Make sure you bring water to help keep hydrated and simply wear slip on shoes on your feet. 
Please confirm the booking by replying Y or N. 
Here is our address ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. 
We look forward to meeting you! "
